title: Define variables
text: Let k $$=$$ the 90th precentile. Find k, where $$P(x \leq $$ k) $$=$$ $$0.90$$.

title: Calculator Function
text: Use the calculator function: InvNorm(percentage, mean, sd)

title: Explanation
text: The 90th percentile for the mean of $$75$$ scores is about $$3.2$$. This tells us that 90% of all the means of $$75$$ stress scores are at most $$3.2$$, and that 10% are at least $$3.2$$
